text: Playing through the first chapter of Deltarune made me remember just how much fun these games are. We probably won't see the full game for a long while though. Undertale was something special and as much as I like to play comfort food games and sequels in franchises I love, playing something completely unique is a rarity these days that deservedly should get high praise when done right.
author: SupraDarky

text: I wholeheartedly agree with you about that. I also think that what also made the game so memorable was the incredible soundtrack
